job.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: pstrongKey projectsstrongppnbspAs a Senior Site Reliability Engineer you will be responsible for the daytoday maintenance operational support and reliability of Internetbased and instore systemsppnbspOn an ongoing basis this position will help identify root causes of operational issues and partner with other team members to drive resolutionppbrppbrppstrongDaily ResponsibilitiesstrongppnbspProvide breakfix customer support and communication to product teamsppnbspCreate and manage Service Level Indicators SLIs and Service Level Objectives SLOs using New Relic and Splunkpp Resolve performance bottlenecks using data from monitoring tools and profiling utilities like dotTrace dotMemory and PerfViewppnbspManage configuration of monitoring and alerting in New Relic Splunk and Pager DutyppnbspImplement OS and application changes as needed using Chef and JenkinsppnbspCreate and maintain system process and training documentationpp Drive root cause analysis and postmortem as neededppnbspConduct monthly OS patching and deploy OS application and infrastructure changesppbrppbrppstrongQualificationsstrongppnbsp46 years supporting external customerfacing web services for a large siteppnbsp46 years installing configuring and troubleshooting Windowsbased systems and services using IIS and MSSQLpp 23 years using Chef to manage servers in Windows environmentppnbsp23 years using Splunk New Relic and Pager Duty in a large customerfacing environmentppnbsp23 years managing VIPs pools and members on F5 Big IPppnbspOutstanding troubleshooting attention to detail written and spoken communication skillsppnbspExperience defining and using Service Level Indicators SLIs and Service Level Objectives SLOsp
